title: Docker + System Dashboard
description: Simple Dashboard that display system metric (first line) and docker metric (line under). Dashboard compatible with Grafana 4 using alert functionality.

targets.expr: node_load1{instance=~"$server:.*"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu{instance=~"$server:.*"}))
node_load1{instance=~"$server:.*"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu{instance=~"$server:.*"}))
